Description: Necklace (?) composed of many beads or pendants of various materials, shapes and dimensions: including short and long cylinder, barrel, spherical, short and long truncated bicone, drop-shaped beads and pendants of cornelian, glazed composition, glass, shell, rock crystal, and black stone.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2007 9 Mar-3 Sept, Belgium, Musee Royal de Mariemont, 'Pharaons noirs Sur la Piste des Quarante Jours'
